item.description:
Please bring pencil/paper and your copy of "The Artist's Way" by Julia Cameron

Read Chapters One and Two and acquaint yourself with the Basic Tools

Suggested timeline:

30 min - Ch 1 + 2 discussion

30 min - Activities (at end of chapters)

15 min - Debrief

30 min - Artist share


If you have a small piece of creative work you want to share, we will make time in the last 30 minutes for you.
item.why: 6 wks of "The Artist's Way" Structure: Two chapters discussed every 2 weeks: Artist share at end of each meetup Meetups: Th 2/3; Th 2/17; Th 3/3; Th 3/17; Th 3/31; Th 4/7 ** After Feb 3 this CLUSTER WILL BE CLOSED TO NEW MEMBERSHIP **
item.name: FRESH START 2011: THE ARTIST'S WAY CH 1-12
